children.value: You will need the following files to perform the cloudpak installation:
You can get this from XL Downloads or Passport Advantage. As of February 2020, this can be found as
IBM Cloud Pak For Integration 2019.4.1 On Openshift For Linux English (CC4R5EN )
The latest ICP package. This can also be download from Passport Advantage. Please note that
. That means that if you want to install with
you must replace the ICP package.
You must install all the correct Command Line Interfaces. Those are:
IBM Cloud CLI, which can be installed using:
OpenShift CLI, which can be installed following the instruction
